ygData.subject: Re: Laptops & EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Biggest problem with laptops is finding a 3D Card for one.. right now they don t exist to my knowledge.. I know companies are looking to make them but they are
ygData.messageBody:
Biggest problem with laptops is finding a 3D Card for one.. right now they don't exist to my
knowledge.. I know companies are looking to make them but they are not out and will be very
expensive.

Chris

----- Original Message -----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) <kblair@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Laptops & EQ


> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> Has anyone ever gotten EQ to work on a laptop? I'm purchasing a laptop, but
> would like to find one that could run EQ as well so I could run my bard all
> around while I run around. If anyone has any recommendations or experiences,
> please share them.
>
>
